question_original: My baby weight is 452 gram in 22weeks..is this normal
question_translated: My baby weighs 452 grams at 22 weeks...is this normal?
answer: Based on the information provided, I don't have specific guidelines regarding fetal weight at 22 weeks to determine if 452 grams is within a normal range. It's important to discuss this with your healthcare provider, who can assess the growth of your baby in the context of overall health and development during your pregnancy. They can provide you with the best advice and care. Remember, regular prenatal check-ups are crucial for monitoring the health and development of your baby. If you have any concerns about your pregnancy, it's always best to consult with your healthcare provider.

question_original: Sometimes I don’t feel the baby’s move ..is it okay or something else?
question_translated: Sometimes I do not feel fetal movements. Is this normal or is there a concern?
answer:
It's normal to occasionally not feel your baby move, especially earlier in pregnancy when movements can be less noticeable. However, if you notice a significant decrease in your baby's movements or if movements stop, this could be a sign of a serious complication. It's important to monitor the baby's movements, especially as you get further along in your pregnancy.

If you're concerned about the frequency or pattern of your baby's movements, it's best to contact your healthcare provider immediately for further advice. They can perform checks to ensure everything is progressing well with your pregnancy. Remember, it's always better to be cautious and seek advice if you're unsure or worried.

question_original: I have seen prickly heat and itching on some part of my body... What should I do?
question_translated: I have observed miliaria and pruritus on some area of my body... What should I do?
answer:
Prickly heat and itching are common during pregnancy due to hormonal changes and increased sweating. Here are a few tips to help manage the discomfort:

1. Keep the affected area cool and dry. Try to stay in cooler environments and avoid excessive heat.
2. Wear loose, breathable clothing made from natural fibers like cotton, which allows your skin to breathe and reduces irritation.
3. Bathe in cool water and use a mild soap that is gentle on the skin.
4. You can apply a calamine lotion or an over-the-counter hydrocortisone cream to soothe itching. However, it's always best to consult with your healthcare provider before using any medications.
5. Stay hydrated by drinking plenty of water, as this helps to regulate your body temperature.

If the itching is severe, widespread, or accompanied by other symptoms like jaundice, it's important to consult your healthcare provider for further evaluation. Remember, it's always best to seek personalized advice from your healthcare provider regarding any health concerns during pregnancy.

question_original: Pragnancy me mango 🥭 kitna mntra me kha skti hu
question_translated: How much mango 🥭 can I eat during pregnancy?
answer: Mujhe mango ke sevan ke liye kisi specific mahine ke bare mein jankari dene ke liye paryapt suchna nahi hai, jo di gayi guidelines mein shaamil hai. Aam tor par, mango ek poshtik phal hai jo vitamin C aur fiber se bharpoor hota hai. Garbhavastha ke dauran, yadi aapko mango se koi allergy nahi hai aur aapka sugar level samanya hai, to aap iska sevan kar sakti hain, lekin yah sunishchit karein ki aap ise santulit matra mein khayein. Har vyakti ki nutritional zarooratein alag hoti hain, isliye apne aahar mein mango shamil karne se pehle ek swasthya visheshagya ya apne doctor se salah zaroor lein.

question_original: Bacche ko Tej Sardi ho to kaise usko maintain Karen
question_translated: How to maintain a child with severe cold?
answer:
Agar bacche ko tej sardi ho rahi hai, toh yeh kuch upay hain jo aap kar sakti hain:

1. Bacche ko garam rakhein: Bacche ko acche se cover karein, khaaskar uske sir aur pair ko. Thandi mausam mein, bacche ko extra kapde pahnaayein.

2. Bacche ke sone ka sthan garam rakhein: Bacche ko sone ke liye ek garam aur sukhad jagah pradan karein. Agar aapke paas radiant warmer hai toh uska istemal karein.

3. Swachhta ka dhyan rakhein: Bacche ko sambhalte waqt haatho ko saaf rakhein aur bacche ko bhi saaf rakhein.

4. Bacche ko skin-to-skin contact dein: Agar bacche ko sardi zyada hai toh usko apni skin se lagaye rakhna (kangaroo mother care) madadgar ho sakta hai kyunki yeh bacche ko garam rakhta hai.

5. Agar bacche ko saans lene mein dikkat ho rahi hai ya uske anya gambhir lakshan dikhayi de rahe hain, toh turant swasthya seva pradan karne wale se sampark karein.

Yeh upay aam taur par madadgar hote hain, lekin agar aapko lagta hai ki sthiti gambhir hai, toh kripya turant doctor se sampark karein.

question_original: Kya pregnancy m bleeding hoti h kya yeh normal h
question_translated: Does bleeding occur during pregnancy, is this normal?
answer:
Bleeding ke dauran pregnancy mein hamesha ek chinta ka vishay hota hai aur ise halka nahi lena chahiye. Pregnancy ke shuruaati 20 hafte ke dauran, bleeding ka karan ho sakta hai dhamki di hui garbhpaat (threatened abortion), swatah garbhpaat (spontaneous abortion), ectopic pregnancy ya hydatidiform mole. Agar aapko bleeding ho rahi hai, to yeh zaroori hai ki aap turant apne swasthya seva pradaata se sampark karein.

Bleeding hamesha normal nahi hoti hai aur iska karan aur prabandhan vyakti ke aadhaar par alag-alag ho sakta hai. Isliye, yadi aapko pregnancy ke dauran kisi bhi prakar ki bleeding ho rahi hai, to kripya apne doctor ya swasthya seva pradaata se sampark karein taki ve sthiti ka sahi mulyankan kar sakein aur uchit salah de sakein.

question_original: mujhe thyroid h to kya isse bhi breast milk pe asar hota h
question_translated: I have thyroid, does this also affect breast milk?
answer: Mujhe aapke sawaal ka jawab dene ke liye di gayi jaankari mein koi seedha sandarbh nahi mila hai ki thyroid ki samasya se breast milk par kya asar padta hai. Yeh zaroori hai ki aap apne healthcare provider se is vishay mein vistar se baat karein, kyunki ve aapki personal medical condition ko samajhne mein madad kar sakte hain aur sahi salah de sakte hain. Thyroid ki samasyaon ka ilaaj aur unka prabandhan zaroori hai, aur yeh aapke overall swasthya aur breastfeeding ke anubhav par asar daal sakta hai. Kripya apne doctor se sampark karein taaki aapko sahi margdarshan mil sake.

question_original: 2.5 months hogae h pregnancy ko but vomet ya kch ni hora mjhe
question_translated: Query: I am 2.5 months pregnant but I am not experiencing any vomiting or other symptoms.
answer: Aapko chinta karne ki zarurat nahi hai agar aapko pregnancy ke 2.5 mahine mein vomiting ya koi aur takleef nahi ho rahi hai. Har mahila ki pregnancy alag hoti hai, aur kuch mahilao ko vomiting ya morning sickness nahi hoti. Yeh bilkul normal hai. Lekin, agar aapko koi aur symptoms dikhayi de rahe hain jo aapko pareshan kar rahe hain, toh aapko apne healthcare provider se zaroor consult karna chahiye. Woh aapki aur aapke baby ki health ka sahi se assessment kar sakenge. Aapka dhyan rakhna aur regular check-ups karwana important hai.

question_original: जयदा टाइम तक बैठने से चक्कर आना खड़ा होने से पेट दर्द होने लगता हैमेरे को कौन सी टेबलेट खानी चाहिए अभी सट्टा मा लग चुका है
question_translated: Query: Sitting for a long time causes dizziness, standing causes abdominal pain. Which tablet should I take? I have just had a miscarriage.
answer: मुझे आपके प्रश्न का उत्तर देने के लिए पर्याप्त जानकारी नहीं है क्योंकि प्रदान की गई दिशानिर्देशों में इस स्थिति के लिए विशेष जानकारी शामिल नहीं है। चक्कर आना और खड़े होने पर पेट दर्द होना जैसी समस्याएं गंभीर हो सकती हैं, इसलिए मैं आपको सलाह दूंगा कि आप जल्द से जल्द एक स्वास्थ्य सेवा प्रदाता से संपर्क करें। वे आपकी विशेष स्थिति का मूल्यांकन कर सकते हैं और उचित उपचार प्रदान कर सकते हैं। अपनी सुरक्षा के लिए, कृपया बिना चिकित्सकीय सलाह के कोई दवा न लें।

Complete abortion
Th e following are the signs of complete abortion:
• Th  ere is light bleeding or there has been heavy bleeding which has now stopped.
• Th  ere is lower abdominal pain.
• Th  ere is a history of expulsion of POC.

Management:
 ∙ Observe the woman for 4-6 hours. Advise her to take rest.
 ∙ If the bleeding decreases or stops, explain the facts to her, reassure her and advise her to go home after you 
have checked her vital signs.
 ∙ Advise her to return to you or the MO if the bleeding recurs.

question_original: सर्दी -जुकाम  हो रहा  है।इसका बच्चे पर तो कोई प्रभाव  नहीं  होगा ।
question_translated: Query: Cold and cough is occurring. It will not have any impact on the baby.
answer:
सर्दी-जुकाम आमतौर पर हल्की स्थिति होती है और यह अक्सर बच्चों पर गंभीर प्रभाव नहीं डालती। हालांकि, यह महत्वपूर्ण है कि आप बच्चे की निगरानी करें और अगर बच्चे में निम्नलिखित लक्षण दिखाई दें तो तुरंत स्वास्थ्य सेवा प्रदाता से संपर्क करें:

- तेज बुखार
- सांस लेने में कठिनाई
- निरंतर रोना या असामान्य शांत होना
- खाना पीना कम कर देना

अगर आपको ये लक्षण नहीं दिखाई देते हैं, तो आमतौर पर सर्दी-जुकाम से बच्चे को कोई गंभीर समस्या नहीं होती। फिर भी, अगर आपको कोई चिंता है तो डॉक्टर से सलाह लेना उचित होगा।
